name: Tortharious
description:
Compete against a friend using two xbox controllers or keyboard, and jump your way through awesomeness.

A game obviously about the old race between the Hare and the Tortoise, obviously an endless runner, juiced up, pumped up and ready to take you on a journey.

On your way racing, you pick up portals, that allows you to change the world, use them wisely!


Controls:

F1 for Credits!

Keyboard:

Player 1:
Move: WASD
Use: Space

Player 2:
Move: Arrow keys
Use: Enter

Xbox:

All players:
Move: Left stick
Jump: A
Use: B
